title: Friendship beats the storm
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Department of the Attorney-General, partner

abstract: 'It was like a hand as it tore at a house nearby. Then something big slammed our house.'
description: Best friends Kiera Chapman and Eliza Goldsmith have been through quite a lot together. When Chapman's family took shelter during the torando that hit Lennox Head in 2010, Goldsmith cut her feet running over to see if Chapman was ok. As they weathered the storm together, they share the experience with their family, community and with each other.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002419; Living with disaster 2 : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2010
